SELECT /* BDDNewsletterMapper.selectNewsletterList */ NWSLT_SEQ , TITL , READ_CNT , EXPS_YN
, (SELECT web_path FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE FILE_SEQ = A.PC_THNL_SEQ ORDER BY FILE_ORD DESC LIMIT 1) WEB_PATH
, REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM FROM BD_NWSLT_MST A WHERE 1=1
LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT /* BDDNewsletterMapper.getNewsletterListCnt */ COUNT(*) FROM BD_NWSLT_MST A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT /* BDDNewsletterMapper.selectNewsletterDtl */ NWSLT_SEQ , TITL , CNTN , FILE_SEQ , PC_THNL_SEQ , MBL_THNL_SEQ , EXPS_YN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM FROM BD_NWSLT_MST A WHERE NWSLT_SEQ = #{detailsKey}

SELECT /* BDDNewsletterMapper.selectNewsletterFileOrdList */ FILE_ORD , FILE_SEQ , ORGN_FILE_NM AS FILE_NAME FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_SEQ = (SELECT FILE_SEQ FROM BD_NWSLT_MST where NWSLT_SEQ = #{detailsKey})

SELECT /* BDDNewsletterMapper.selectNextAndPrevSeqVal */ ROW_NUM , NEXT_SEQ , (SELECT TITL FROM BD_NWSLT_MST WHERE NWSLT_SEQ = NEXT_SEQ) AS NEXT_TITL , PREV_SEQ , (SELECT TITL FROM BD_NWSLT_MST WHERE NWSLT_SEQ = PREV_SEQ) AS PREV_TITL FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BD_NWSLT_MST B WHERE B.NWSLT_SEQ <= A.NWSLT_SEQ) AS ROW_NUM , (SELECT MIN(NWSLT_SEQ) FROM BD_NWSLT_MST C WHERE C.NWSLT_SEQ > A.NWSLT_SEQ) AS NEXT_SEQ , (SELECT MAX(NWSLT_SEQ) FROM BD_NWSLT_MST D WHERE D.NWSLT_SEQ < A.NWSLT_SEQ) AS PREV_SEQ FROM BD_NWSLT_MST A WHERE NWSLT_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY NWSLT_SEQ ) TB

)
